text:
Good Morning/Afternoon :wave:

:moneybag: :takemymoney: :moneybag: :takemymoney: :moneybag: :takemymoney: :moneybag: :takemymoney: :moneybag: :takemymoney:

`Want to shape what we build next?` *We want your input on how you might spend $100 across the following options. You can pay $1 for a single item or the whole $100; it's up to you. Let us know where you'd spend your money & why*

1. Share your knowledge through community-driven content and examples within HubSpot docs.
2. Streamline your skill development with tailored learning journeys integrated within your dev account.
3. Contextual change-log experience - know exactly which posts impact you and your code
4. Personalized documentation with automatic recommendations for best practices, tutorials, and code snippets tailored to you.
5. Ideate faster by designing and sharing interactive UI extension concepts from our documentation.
6. Docs search summaries drawn from multiple articles with reference links - stop wasting time searching and focus on creating.
7. Make collaboration easier through an interactive, shareable API playground for code snippets and test cases.
8. Other _(drop a note in the_ :thread: )
5, could be a great figma template, the current figma for react extensions isn't really what most people are looking for
The dollar signs here triggered my potential spam warnings lol - but answer this, one and all! :smile:
